name: Colony Corral
description:
Colony Corral is a game about animals. And Florida. And space.

The settlers of Space Florida have been forced to abandon their fledgling settlement and retreat to the safety of Regular Florida. In their haste, they forgot to pack up all the animals. You must use shrimp, chicken, and garbage to lead the flamingos, gators, and possums to their escape pods and send them safely home!
